title: CIDER Wide Leg Jeans for Women High Waisted Denim Pants Boyfriend Jeans Trendy Casual Summer Bottom
description: High-Rise Comfort: Experience the perfect blend of style and comfort with these high-rise jeans designed to flatter your waistline. The elevated waist provides a secure fit that accentuates your figure, making them a versatile addition to any wardrobe

Quality Denim Material: Crafted from a durable blend of 93% cotton and 7% polyester, these jeans offer a thick, opaque fabric that ensures longevity and resistance to wear and tear. The thick denim provides a structured look that doesn't compromise on comfort

Straight Leg Cut: The timeless straight leg style offers a sleek silhouette that pairs effortlessly with any footwear. Whether you're dressing up for a night out or keeping it casual, these jeans will keep you looking chic and feeling confident

Versatile Cropped Length: These jeans feature a cropped length that's perfect for showcasing your favorite shoes. The versatile cut makes them suitable for various seasons and occasions, allowing you to transition from day to night with ease

Size Details: These jeans has no stretch so please refer to the size chart and select one size up. Choosing a size larger ensures comfort throughout the day, allowing for ease of movement while maintaining style
